org.dsa.iot.dslink.node.actions.table

Class Table

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dsa.iot.dslink.node.actions.table.Table

  • public class Table
extends java.lang.Object
    Constructs a table for action results. This class is not thread safe.

      • addBatchRows

        public void addBatchRows(java.util.List<Parameter> cols,
                         BatchRow batch)
        Batch metadata is ignored if the table is not streaming.
        Parameters:
        cols - Columns to dynamically adjust columns of the table.
        batch - Batch of rows.

      • setStreaming

        public void setStreaming(int rid,
                         DataHandler writer,
                         Handler<java.lang.Void> closeHandler)
        Used to set the table to streaming mode. This is called automatically for any tables that keep their stream open.
        Parameters:
        rid - Request ID
        writer - Writer endpoint
        closeHandler - Close handler

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes a streaming table. This is not necessary to call for one-shot tables.

      • setClosed

        public void setClosed()
        Sets the table to closed if it was streaming without notifying the network. Automatically called when close() is called or the requester closes the table to prevent unnecessary updates.

      • getTableMeta

        public JsonObject getTableMeta()
        Returns:
        Table metadata.
